definitions.care/harm: Intuitions about avoiding emotional and physical damage to another individual.
definitions.fairness/cheating: Intuitions about equal treatment and fair outcomes for individuals.
definitions.loyalty/betrayal: Intuitions about cooperating with ingroups and defending them from betrayal.
definitions.authority/subversion: Intuitions about deference to legitimate authority and respect for traditions.
definitions.sanctity/degradation: Intuitions about avoiding bodily and spiritual contamination and degradation.
definitions.liberty/oppression: Intuitions about resistance to domination and valuing personal autonomy.

definitions.care_harm: Intuitions about avoiding emotional and physical damage to another individual.
definitions.fairness_cheating: Intuitions about equal treatment and fair outcomes for individuals.
definitions.loyalty_betrayal: Intuitions about cooperating with ingroups and defending them from betrayal.
definitions.authority_subversion: Intuitions about deference to legitimate authority and respect for traditions.
definitions.sanctity_degradation: Intuitions about avoiding bodily and spiritual contamination and degradation.

definitions.caring: Showing concern and nurturing for others’ well-being.
definitions.kindness: Acting with consideration and benevolence toward others.
definitions.compassion: Sympathetic concern for the suffering of others.
definitions.gentleness: Mild and tender behavior toward others.
definitions.fairness: Treating others justly and without bias.
definitions.justice: Upholding what is morally right and lawful.
definitions.reciprocity: Responding to actions of others with equivalent actions.
definitions.trustworthiness: Being reliable and worthy of trust.
definitions.equality: Ensuring similar treatment and rights for all.
definitions.loyalty: Allegiance to one's group or community.
definitions.patriotism: Love and support for one’s country.
definitions.self-sacrifice: Willingness to give up one’s own interest for others.
definitions.group allegiance: Commitment to the welfare of one's group.
definitions.respect: Recognition of others’ status and experience.
definitions.deference: Yielding to the judgment or opinion of others.
definitions.purity: Avoidance of moral or physical contamination.
definitions.autonomy: Acting according to one's own values and desires.
definitions.rebellion: Act of defying authority or norms.
